major_article.title: Enhancing AG Grid Enterprise with AG Charts Enterprise
major_article.description: Integrated Charting has been enhanced in v31.1 so that it now also contains all of the features & series types available in AG Charts Enterprise, our new enterprise-grade charting library. Read this blog to learn more about the differences between Integrated Community & Enterprise Charts
major_article.author: James Swinton-Bland

minor_articles.title: Whats New in AG Charts 9.1
minor_articles.description: What's New in AG Charts 9.1 - Enterprise Charts are integrated into AG Grid, Synchronized Charts, Mini Chart in Navigator, Asynchronous Data Loading
minor_articles.author: David Glickman

minor_articles.title: Whats New in AG Grid 31.1
minor_articles.description: What's New in AG Grid 31.1 - integrated Enterprise Charts, Column Menu Redesign, Custom Menu Item Components, Compression of Excel files and more
minor_articles.author: Kiril Matev

minor_articles.title: Exporting AG Grid to PDF with pdfMake
minor_articles.description: Learn how to export AG Grid to PDF using the PDF library pdfMake. Get the samples in JavaScript, React, Angular and Vue to integrate this in your projects.
minor_articles.author: Abi Glazier
